attributes.action: Stop the closure of pubs because of the business rates
attributes.additional_details: Because using a pub is an enjoyment that people like to do and is the core of a lot of small communities
attributes.background: Prioritise this issue as the impact on local communities and lively hoods ,which any closure would be devastating as once closed they will not reopen

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about the closure of pubs, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

Do not implement the business rate increases planned for April 2026: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/753272
